import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Template from '../components/Template' import axios from 'axios' import ResponseError from '../utils/ResponseError' import config from '../config' import Modal from '../components/Modal' const ReportSumSalePerYear = () => { const [reports, setReports] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetchData() }, []) const fetchData = async () => { try { const res = await axios.get(config.path + '/package/report-year', config.headers()) if (res.data.status) { setReports(res.data.data) } } catch (error) { ResponseError(error.message) } } return ( <>
) } export default ReportSumSalePerYear
